CVrisk 1.1.0
  • Reference

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

CVrisk 1.1.02021-12-06

Improve risk score calculation performance for large datasets. Contribution by @hhubbell

Add other race in ACC/AHA 2013 ASCVD risk score. Other race have same risk as White race as used in the official online calculator. See #2.

Added two additional risk scores: - MESA 2015 10-year ASCVD risk (traditional risk factors) - MESA 2015 10-year ASCVD risk (using coronary artery calcium)

Out of range or missing inputs now return NA instead of erroring out

CVrisk 1.0.02020-10-27

Initial CRAN release.
